(11) 
brisk, & Stormy on 10<sup>th<\sup>, 11<sup>th<\sup> & 12<sup>th<\sup>. Then the Weather, 
for the most part, Fair, till the 15<sup>th<\sup>. After 
that Cloudy, & but little Fair, w<sup>th<\sup> frequent & 
plentifull Rain. 
<u>Juy<\u> also was a Cloudy, Wet Month, w<sup>th<\sup> 
but little Fair, & some Thunder, w<sup>ch<\sup> was 
sometimes violent. The Winds, for the most 
part, were between the W & S, & moderate. 
In <u>August<\u> the Winds were more 
N<sup>ly<\sup> & E<sup>ly<\sup> than in July, & sometimes between 
the W & S, & moderate in all the Points. 
The first 9 or 10 days were, for the most 
part, Fair. After that, 9 or 10 days more, 
Cloudy, Rain, Lightening in the Evening, loud 
Thunder & Rain in the Days & some in the 
night. And from the 20<sup>th<\sup> to the month's end, 
Fairer, w<sup>th<\sup> Cloudy, Hail & Rain. 
In <u>September<\u> the Winds frequented the 
N<sup>ly<\sup> & W<sup>ly<\sup> Points, were brisk, & sometimes 
Stormy. The Mornings, for the most part, 
Cloudy the 9 first days, & Fairer the rest 
of the day. The greatest part of y<sup>e<\sup> rest of y<sup>e<\sup> 
Month, was Rainy, w<sup>th<\sup> plenty of Snow on the 
25<sup>th<\sup>, then Rain, w<sup>ch<sup> continued in the month of 
<u>Octob<\u>:
